newsitem.title: UK: UK's FTSE 100 opens at record high, extends gains.
newsitem.headline: UK's FTSE 100 opens at record high, extends gains.

text.p: Britain's leading share index opened at a record high on Wednesday as investors continued to pour into banking and pharmaceutical shares in what traders see as a squeeze in the big-cap stocks.
At 0745 GMT, the FTSE 100 traded 22 points higher at 4,921.3 after opening at 4,909.6, boosted by follow-through buying from Tuesday when it set its second consecutive record closing high.
Technical analysts marked resistance at 4,930 as the index shoots for its sixth straight session of gains.
